Animal - Class in com.android
simple class to create Animals Animal class does NOT have it's own equals method, so it will use the equals() method from the Object class so Animals will said to be equal only if two references point to the same Animal

equals(Object) - Method in class com.android.Human
equals method for Human class, if two humans have the same name we say they are equal
ex1() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
introduction to the list interface and how class that implements the list interface can only take objects, and how it's resizable.
ex2() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
more on list made from array and introduction to some Java 8 Streams functional programming that can be used to create lists and to filter them using removieIf and to create and filter lists using Stream.generate and filiter() and limit()
ex3() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
this covers searching and sorting of arrays by using Arrays.sort() and Arrays.binarySearch() and how this only works with primitive numbers, chars and only those classes that implement the Comparable interface(see Human class).
ex4() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
using lists with Wrapper objects and specifically the remove() method uses the equals() method to first find a object in a list and then remove it from the list
ex5() - Static method in class com.android.Examples
This is a brief intro to the next topic of Generics and how this pertains to Lists
Examples - Class in com.android
class that hold examples that illustrates some of the common concepts of Collections
